price: That is Paradise which you will inherit for what you used to do.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
